Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims for SC for chronic or tropical diseases, including
considering
SC for a tropical disease
, and
presumptive SC
establishing presumptive SC for tropical diseases
, and
action to take if a chronic or tropical disease was
treated in service
, and
not treated in service
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1 - Service Connection (SC) for Tropical Diseases
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section None
